text: Daniel David Kirwan (13 May 1950 â€“ 8 June 2018) was a British Hall of Fame blues rock guitarist and singer-songwriter. He was born in London. His greatest success came with his role as a member of the band Fleetwood Mac between 1968 and 1972. Kirwan died on 8 June 2018 in London from pneumonia at the age of 68. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1950 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:British singer- songwriters Category:British rock guitarists Category:Blues guitarists Category:Fleetwood Mac members Category:Singers from London Category:Musicians from London Category:Writers from London
title: Danny Kirwan
